trans-unit.source: This method traverses the list of registered security providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. For each KeyStoreSpi implementation supported by a Provider, it invokes the engineProbe method to determine if it supports the specified keystore. A new KeyStore object is returned that encapsulates the KeyStoreSpi implementation from the first Provider that supports the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从最喜欢的提供者开始遍历已注册安全提供者的列表。对于提供者支持的每个 KeyStoreSpi 实现，它都会调用 engineProbe 方法来确定它是否支持指定的密钥库。返回一个新的KeyStore对象，该对象封装了支持指定文件的第一个Provider的KeyStoreSpi实现。

trans-unit.source: This method traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new SecureRandom object encapsulating the SecureRandomSpi implementation from the first Provider that supports the specified algorithm and the specified SecureRandomParameters is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从最喜欢的提供者开始遍历已注册安全提供者的列表。返回一个新的 SecureRandom 对象，该对象封装了支持指定算法和指定 SecureRandomParameters 的第一个Provider的 SecureRandomSpi 实现。

trans-unit.source: This method traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new SecureRandom object encapsulating the SecureRandomSpi implementation from the first Provider that supports the specified algorithm is returned.

trans-unit.source: This method treats all white space characters as having equal width. As long as the indentation on every line is consistently composed of the same character sequences, then the result will be as described above.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将所有空白字符都视为具有相等的宽度。只要每行上的缩进始终由相同的字符序列组成，那么结果将如上所述。

trans-unit.source: This method treats the incidental white space as indentation to be stripped, producing a string that preserves the relative indentation of the content. Using | to visualize the start of each line of the string:
trans-unit.target: 此方法将附带的空白视为要剥离的缩进，从而生成保留内容相对缩进的字符串。使用| 可视化字符串的每一行的开头：

trans-unit.source: This method tries to read one character from the current substream. If it reaches the end of the stream, it calls the close method of the current substream and begins reading from the next substream.
trans-unit.target: 此方法尝试从当前子流中读取一个字符。如果到达流的末尾，它将调用当前子流的 close 方法并开始从下一个子流读取。

trans-unit.source: This method triggers a sort.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法会触发排序。

trans-unit.source: This method typically does not modify the map in any way, instead allowing the map to modify itself as directed by its return value. It
trans-unit.target: 这个方法通常不以任何方式修改地图,而是允许地图按照其返回值的指示修改自己。它

trans-unit.source: This method updates the file's timestamp attributes. The values are converted to the epoch and precision supported by the file system. Converting from finer to coarser granularities result in precision loss. The behavior of this method when attempting to set a timestamp that is not supported or to a value that is outside the range supported by the underlying file store is not defined. It may or not fail by throwing an IOException.
trans-unit.target: 此方法更新文件的时间戳属性。值将转换为文件系统支持的纪元和精度。从较细粒度转换为较粗粒度会导致精度损失。尝试设置不支持的时间戳或将其设置为基础文件存储支持的范围之外的值时，此方法的行为未定义。通过抛出 IOException 可能会失败，也可能不会失败。

trans-unit.source: This method updates the logging configuration from reading a properties file and ignores the "java.util.logging.config.class" system property. The "java.util.logging.config.class" property is only used by the readConfiguration() method to load a custom configuration class as an initial configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过读取属性文件来更新日志记录配置，并且忽略“ java.util.logging.config.class”系统属性。“ java.util.logging.config.class”属性仅由 readConfiguration() 方法用于加载自定义配置类作为初始配置。

trans-unit.source: This method used to return the value of a proprietary property in the master file of the "SUN" Cryptographic Service Provider in order to determine how to parse algorithm-specific parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于返回 "SUN "加密服务提供者的主文件中的专有属性值,以确定如何解析特定算法参数。

trans-unit.source: This method used to return the value of a proprietary property in the master file of the "SUN" Cryptographic Service Provider in order to determine how to parse algorithm-specific parameters. Use the new provider-based and algorithm-independent AlgorithmParameters and KeyFactory engine classes (introduced in the J2SE version 1.2 platform) instead.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于在“ SUN”密码服务提供者的主文件中返回专有属性的值，以便确定如何解析特定于算法的参数。而是使用新的基于提供者且与算法无关的 AlgorithmParameters 和 KeyFactory 引擎类（在J2SE 1.2版平台中引入）。

trans-unit.source: This method uses NO_FLUSH as its compression flush mode. An invocation of this method of the form deflater.deflate(b) yields the same result as the invocation of deflater.deflate(b, 0, b.length, Deflater.NO_FLUSH).
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用 NO_FLUSH 作为其压缩刷新模式。调用形式为 deflater.deflate(b) 的方法所产生的结果与调用 deflater.deflate(b, 0, b.length, Deflater.NO_FLUSH) 。

trans-unit.source: This method uses NO_FLUSH as its compression flush mode. An invocation of this method of the form deflater.deflate(b, off, len) yields the same result as the invocation of deflater.deflate(b, off, len, Deflater.NO_FLUSH).
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用 NO_FLUSH 作为其压缩刷新模式。调用这种形式为 deflater.deflate(b, off, len) 产生的结果与调用 deflater.deflate(b, off, len, Deflater.NO_FLUSH) 。

trans-unit.source: This method uses NO_FLUSH as its compression flush mode. An invocation of this method of the form deflater.deflate(output) yields the same result as the invocation of deflater.deflate(output, Deflater.NO_FLUSH).
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用 NO_FLUSH 作为其压缩刷新模式。调用形式为 deflater.deflate(output) 的方法所产生的结果与调用 deflater.deflate(output, Deflater.NO_FLUSH) 。

trans-unit.target: 此方法使用 getPrintable(java.text.MessageFormat, java.text.MessageFormat) 呈现文档内容。

trans-unit.source: This method uses NO_FLUSH as its compression flush mode. An invocation of this method of the form deflater.deflate(b) yields the same result as the invocation of deflater.deflate(b, 0, b.length, Deflater.NO_FLUSH).

trans-unit.source: This method uses NO_FLUSH as its compression flush mode. An invocation of this method of the form deflater.deflate(b, off, len) yields the same result as the invocation of deflater.deflate(b, off, len, Deflater.NO_FLUSH).
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用 NO_FLUSH 作为其压缩刷新模式。调用形式为 deflater.deflate(b, off, len) 产生的结果与调用 deflater.deflate(b, off, len, Deflater.NO_FLUSH) 。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the installed FileTypeDetector implementations to probe the given file to determine its content type. Each file type detector's probeContentType is invoked, in turn, to probe the file type. If the file is recognized then the content type is returned. If the file is not recognized by any of the installed file type detectors then a system-default file type detector is invoked to guess the content type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用已安装的 FileTypeDetector 实现来探测给定文件以确定其内容类型。依次调用每个文件类型检测器的 probeContentType 来探测文件类型。如果识别出文件，则返回内容类型。如果任何已安装的文件类型检测器均未识别该文件，则将调用系统默认的文件类型检测器来猜测内容类型。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the installed FileTypeDetector implementations to probe the given file to determine its content type. Each file type detector's probeContentType is invoked, in turn, to probe the file type. If the file is recognized then the content type is returned. If the file is not recognized by any of the installed file type detectors then a system-default file type detector is invoked to guess the content type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用已安装的 FileTypeDetector 实现来探测给定文件以确定其内容类型。依次调用每个文件类型检测器的 probeContentType 以探测文件类型。如果识别出文件，则返回内容类型。如果任何已安装的文件类型检测器无法识别该文件，则将调用系统默认的文件类型检测器来猜测内容类型。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the specified map for type map customizations unless the base type of the array does not match a user-defined type in map, in which case it uses the standard mapping. This version of the method getArray uses either the given type map or the standard mapping; it never uses the type map associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用指定的 map 为类型映射自定义，除非该数组的基本类型不匹配的用户定义类型 map ，在这种情况下，它使用标准映射。此版本的 getArray 方法使用给定的类型映射或标准映射。它从不使用与连接关联的类型映射。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the specified state factories in the Context.STATE_FACTORIES property from the environment properties, and from the provider resource file associated with nameCtx, in that order. The value of this property is a colon-separated list of factory class names that are tried in order, and the first one that succeeds in returning the object's state is the one used. If no object's state can be retrieved in this way, return the object itself. If an exception is encountered while retrieving the state, the exception is passed up to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用环境属性以及与 nameCtx 关联的提供程序资源文件中的 Context.STATE_FACTORIES 属性中的指定状态工厂（按此顺序）。此属性的值是按顺序尝试的工厂类名称的冒号分隔列表，并且使用第一个成功返回对象状态的名称。如果无法通过这种方式检索对象的状态，请返回对象本身。如果在检索状态时遇到异常，则会将该异常向上传递给调用方。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the standard JCA provider lookup mechanism to locate and instantiate a KeyInfoFactory implementation of the default mechanism type. It traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new KeyInfoFactory object from the first Provider that supports the DOM mechanism is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用标准的JCA提供程序查找机制来查找和实例化默认机制类型的 KeyInfoFactory 实现。它从最喜欢的 Provider 开始遍历已注册的安全 Provider 的列表。从支持DOM机制的第一个 Provider 返回一个新的 KeyInfoFactory 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the standard JCA provider lookup mechanism to locate and instantiate a KeyInfoFactory implementation of the desired mechanism type. It traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new KeyInfoFactory object from the first Provider that supports the specified mechanism is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用标准的JCA提供程序查找机制来查找和实例化所需机制类型的 KeyInfoFactory 实现。它从最喜欢的 Provider 开始遍历已注册的安全 Provider 的列表。从支持指定机制的第一个 Provider 返回一个新的 KeyInfoFactory 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the standard JCA provider lookup mechanism to locate and instantiate a TransformService implementation of the desired algorithm and MechanismType service attribute. It traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new TransformService object from the first Provider that supports the specified algorithm and mechanism type is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用标准的JCA提供程序查找机制来定位和实例化所需算法和 MechanismType 服务属性的 TransformService 实现。它从最喜欢的 Provider 开始遍历已注册的安全 Provider 的列表。返回来自第一个 Provider 新 TransformService 对象，该对象支持指定的算法和机制类型。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the standard JCA provider lookup mechanism to locate and instantiate an XMLSignatureFactory implementation of the default mechanism type. It traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new XMLSignatureFactory object from the first Provider that supports the DOM mechanism is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用标准的JCA提供程序查找机制来查找和实例化默认机制类型的 XMLSignatureFactory 实现。它从最喜欢的 Provider 开始遍历已注册的安全 Provider 的列表。从支持DOM机制的第一个 Provider 返回一个新的 XMLSignatureFactory 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the standard JCA provider lookup mechanism to locate and instantiate an XMLSignatureFactory implementation of the desired mechanism type. It traverses the list of registered security Providers, starting with the most preferred Provider. A new XMLSignatureFactory object from the first Provider that supports the specified mechanism is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用标准的JCA提供程序查找机制来查找和实例化所需机制类型的 XMLSignatureFactory 实现。它从最喜欢的 Provider 开始遍历已注册的安全 Provider 的列表。从支持指定机制的第一个 Provider 返回一个新的 XMLSignatureFactory 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method uses three other methods to set and help track the Action's property values. It uses the configurePropertiesFromAction method to immediately change the button's properties. To track changes in the Action's property values, this method registers the PropertyChangeListener returned by createActionPropertyChangeListener. The default PropertyChangeListener invokes the actionPropertyChanged method when a property in the Action changes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用其他三种方法来设置和帮助跟踪 Action 的属性值。它使用 configurePropertiesFromAction 方法立即更改按钮的属性。为了跟踪 Action 属性值的更改，此方法注册由 createActionPropertyChangeListener 返回的 PropertyChangeListener 。当 Action 中的属性更改时，默认的 PropertyChangeListener 会调用 actionPropertyChanged 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method uses three other methods to set and help track the Action's property values. It uses the configurePropertiesFromAction method to immediately change the combobox's properties. To track changes in the Action's property values, this method registers the PropertyChangeListener returned by createActionPropertyChangeListener. The default PropertyChangeListener invokes the actionPropertyChanged method when a property in the Action changes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用其他三种方法来设置和帮助跟踪 Action 的属性值。它使用 configurePropertiesFromAction 方法立即更改组合框的属性。为了跟踪 Action 属性值的更改，此方法注册由 createActionPropertyChangeListener 返回的 PropertyChangeListener 。当 Action 中的属性更改时，默认的 PropertyChangeListener 会调用 actionPropertyChanged 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method uses three other methods to set and help track the Action's property values. It uses the configurePropertiesFromAction method to immediately change the textfield's properties. To track changes in the Action's property values, this method registers the PropertyChangeListener returned by createActionPropertyChangeListener. The default PropertyChangeListener invokes the actionPropertyChanged method when a property in the Action changes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用其他三种方法来设置和帮助跟踪 Action 的属性值。它使用 configurePropertiesFromAction 方法立即更改文本字段的属性。为了跟踪 Action 属性值的更改，此方法注册由 createActionPropertyChangeListener 返回的 PropertyChangeListener 。当 Action 中的属性更改时，默认的 PropertyChangeListener 会调用 actionPropertyChanged 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method validates that the sharding key is valid for the Connection. The timeout value indicates how long the driver should wait for the Connection to verify that the sharding key is valid before setShardingKeyIfValid returns false.
trans-unit.target: 此方法验证分片密钥对于 Connection 是有效的。超时值指示驱动程序在 setShardingKeyIfValid 返回false之前应等待 Connection 验证分片密钥有效的时间。

trans-unit.source: This method validates that the sharding keys are valid for the Connection. The timeout value indicates how long the driver should wait for the Connection to verify that the sharding key is valid before setShardingKeyIfValid returns false.
trans-unit.target: 此方法验证分片键对于 Connection 是有效的。超时值指示驱动程序在 setShardingKeyIfValid 返回false之前应等待 Connection 验证分片密钥有效的时间。

trans-unit.source: This method validates that, for each class or interface which is recorded as a member of the nest by the nest host, that class or interface records itself as a member of that same nest. Any exceptions that occur during this validation are rethrown by this method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法验证,对于被巢主机记录为巢的成员的每个类或接口,该类或接口都将自己记录为同一巢的成员。在这个验证过程中出现的任何异常都会被这个方法重抛。

trans-unit.source: This method walks a file tree rooted at a given starting file. The file tree traversal is depth-first with the given FileVisitor invoked for each file encountered. File tree traversal completes when all accessible files in the tree have been visited, or a visit method returns a result of TERMINATE. Where a visit method terminates due an IOException, an uncaught error, or runtime exception, then the traversal is terminated and the error or exception is propagated to the caller of this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历以给定起始文件为根的文件树。文件树遍历是深度优先的，为遇到的每个文件调用给定的 FileVisitor 。当访问树中所有可访问的文件或访问方法返回 TERMINATE 的结果时，文件树遍历完成。如果访问方法由于 IOException ，未捕获的错误或运行时异常而终止，则遍历将终止，并且该错误或异常将传播到此方法的调用方。

trans-unit.source: This method walks the file tree in exactly the manner specified by the walk method. For each file encountered, the given BiPredicate is invoked with its Path and BasicFileAttributes. The Path object is obtained as if by resolving the relative path against start and is only included in the returned Stream if the BiPredicate returns true. Compare to calling filter on the Stream returned by walk method, this method may be more efficient by avoiding redundant retrieval of the BasicFileAttributes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法完全按照 walk 方法指定的方式遍历文件树。对于遇到的每个文件，都将使用其 Path 和 BasicFileAttributes 调用给定的 BiPredicate 。就像通过 resolving 相对于 start 的相对路径来获得 Path 对象一样，并且仅当 BiPredicate 返回true时，Path对象才包含在返回的 Stream 中。与在 walk 方法返回的 Stream 上调用 filter 相比，该方法通过避免对 BasicFileAttributes 的冗余检索可能会更高效。

trans-unit.source: This method walks the file tree in exactly the manner specified by the walk method. For each file encountered, the given BiPredicate is invoked with its Path and BasicFileAttributes. The Path object is obtained as if by resolving the relative path against start and is only included in the returned Stream if the BiPredicate returns true. Compare to calling filter on the Stream returned by walk method, this method may be more efficient by avoiding redundant retrieval of the BasicFileAttributes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法完全按照 walk 方法指定的方式遍历文件树。对于遇到的每个文件， BiPredicate 使用其 Path 和 BasicFileAttributes 调用给定的BiPredicate。就像通过 resolving 相对于 start 的相对路径来获得 Path 对象一样，并且仅当 BiPredicate 返回true时，Path对象才包含在返回的 Stream 中。与在 walk 方法返回的 Stream 上调用 filter 相比，该方法通过避免对 BasicFileAttributes 的冗余检索可能会更高效。

trans-unit.source: This method was added to version 1.4 of the Java 2 Platform Standard Edition. In order to maintain backwards compatibility with existing service providers, this method cannot be abstract and by default throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已添加到Java 2 Platform Standard Edition的1.4版中。为了保持与现有服务提供商的向后兼容性，此方法不能 abstract 并且默认情况下抛出 UnsupportedOperationException 。

trans-unit.source: This method was added to version 1.4 of the Java 2 Platform Standard Edition. In order to maintain backwards compatibility with existing service providers, this method is not abstract and it provides a default implementation. Subclasses should override this method with a correct implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已添加到Java 2 Platform Standard Edition的1.4版中。为了保持与现有服务提供商的向后兼容性，此方法不是 abstract ，而是提供了默认实现。子类应使用正确的实现重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method was added to version 1.8 of the Java Platform Standard Edition. In order to maintain backwards compatibility with existing service providers, this method cannot be abstract and by default throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已添加到Java Platform Standard Edition的1.8版中。为了保持与现有服务提供商的向后兼容性，此方法不能 abstract 并且默认情况下抛出 UnsupportedOperationException 。

trans-unit.source: This method was added to version 1.8 of the Java Platform Standard Edition. In order to maintain backwards compatibility with existing service providers, this method cannot be abstract and by default throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已添加到Java Platform Standard Edition的1.8版中。为了保持与现有服务提供商的向后兼容性，此方法不能抽象，并且默认情况下抛出 UnsupportedOperationException 。

trans-unit.source: This method was intended to control instruction tracing.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法是为了控制指令跟踪。

trans-unit.source: This method was intended to control instruction tracing. It has been superseded by JVM-specific tracing mechanisms. This method is subject to removal in a future version of Java SE.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是用来控制指令跟踪的。它已经被JVM特定的跟踪机制所取代。该方法在未来的Java SE版本中可能会被删除。

trans-unit.source: This method was intended to control method call tracing.
trans-unit.target: 该方法旨在控制方法调用跟踪。

trans-unit.source: This method was intended to control method call tracing. It has been superseded by JVM-specific tracing mechanisms. This method is subject to removal in a future version of Java SE.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是用来控制方法调用跟踪的。它已经被JVM特定的跟踪机制所取代。该方法在未来的Java SE版本中可能会被删除。

trans-unit.source: This method was originally designed to count the number of stack frames but the results were never well-defined and it depended on thread-suspension.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法最初是为了统计堆栈帧数而设计的,但结果一直没有很好的定义,它依赖于线程暂停。

trans-unit.source: This method was originally designed to count the number of stack frames but the results were never well-defined and it depended on thread-suspension. This method is subject to removal in a future version of Java SE.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法最初是为了计算堆栈帧数而设计的,但结果一直没有很好的定义,它依赖于线程暂停。这个方法在未来的Java SE版本中会被删除。

trans-unit.source: This method was originally designed to test PRIVATE access that implies full privilege access but MODULE access has since become independent of PRIVATE access.
trans-unit.target: 此方法最初旨在测试隐含完全访问权限的 PRIVATE 访问，但是 MODULE 访问从此变得独立于 PRIVATE 访问。

trans-unit.source: This method was originally designed to test PRIVATE access that implies full privilege access but MODULE access has since become independent of PRIVATE access. It is recommended to call hasFullPrivilegeAccess() instead.
trans-unit.target: 此方法最初旨在测试隐含完全访问权限的 PRIVATE 访问，但是 MODULE 访问从此变得独立于 PRIVATE 访问。建议改为调用 hasFullPrivilegeAccess() 。

trans-unit.source: This method will allow trusted subclasses of ObjectInputStream to substitute one object for another during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将允许ObjectInputStream的可信子类在反序列化过程中用一个对象代替另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: This method will allow trusted subclasses of ObjectInputStream to substitute one object for another during deserialization. Replacing objects is disabled until enableResolveObject is called. The enableResolveObject method checks that the stream requesting to resolve object can be trusted. Every reference to serializable objects is passed to resolveObject. To insure that the private state of objects is not unintentionally exposed only trusted streams may use resolveObject.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将允许ObjectInputStream的可信子类在反序列化过程中用一个对象替换另一个对象。在调用enableResolveObject之前,替换对象是被禁止的。enableResolveObject方法会检查请求解析对象的流是否可以被信任。每一个可序列化对象的引用都会传递给resolveObject。为了保证对象的私有状态不会被无意中暴露,只有受信任的流可以使用resolveObject。

trans-unit.source: This method will allow trusted subclasses of ObjectOutputStream to substitute one object for another during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将允许ObjectOutputStream的可信子类在序列化过程中用一个对象代替另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: This method will allow trusted subclasses of ObjectOutputStream to substitute one object for another during serialization. Replacing objects is disabled until enableReplaceObject is called. The enableReplaceObject method checks that the stream requesting to do replacement can be trusted. The first occurrence of each object written into the serialization stream is passed to replaceObject. Subsequent references to the object are replaced by the object returned by the original call to replaceObject. To ensure that the private state of objects is not unintentionally exposed, only trusted streams may use replaceObject.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将允许ObjectOutputStream的受信任子类在序列化过程中用一个对象替换另一个对象。在调用enableReplaceObject之前,替换对象被禁用。enableReplaceObject方法会检查请求做替换的流是否可以被信任。写入序列化流中的每个对象的第一次出现被传递给replaceObject。随后对该对象的引用会被最初调用replaceObject返回的对象所替换。为了保证对象的私有状态不被无意中暴露,只有受信任的流才可以使用replaceObject。

trans-unit.source: This method will also set up a label table for you. If there is not already a label table, and the major tick spacing is > 0, a standard label table will be generated (by calling createStandardLabels) with labels at the major tick marks. The label table is then set on the slider by calling setLabelTable.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还将为您设置标签表。如果还没有标签表，并且主刻度线间距 > 0 ，则将生成标准标签表（通过调用 createStandardLabels ），其中标签位于主刻度线处。然后通过调用 setLabelTable 在滑块上设置标签表。

trans-unit.source: This method will also set up a label table for you. If there is not already a label table, and the major tick spacing is > 0, and getPaintLabels returns true, a standard label table will be generated (by calling createStandardLabels) with labels at the major tick marks. For the example above, you would get text labels: "0", "10", "20", "30", "40", "50". The label table is then set on the slider by calling setLabelTable.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还将为您设置标签表。如果还没有标签表，并且主刻度线间距 > 0 ，并且 getPaintLabels 返回 true ，则将生成标准标签表（通过调用 createStandardLabels ），其中标签位于主刻度线处。对于上面的示例，您将获得文本标签：“ 0”，“ 10”，“ 20”，“ 30”，“ 40”，“ 50”。然后通过调用 setLabelTable 在滑块上设置标签表。

trans-unit.source: This method will always read an integral number of frames. If len does not specify an integral number of frames, a maximum of len - (len % frameSize) bytes will be read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终读取整数个帧。如果 len 未指定整数帧，则最多读取 len - (len % frameSize) 个字节。

trans-unit.source: This method will always read an integral number of frames. If len does not specify an integral number of frames, a maximum of len - (len % frameSize) bytes will be read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终读取整数个帧。如果 len 未指定整数帧，则将最多读取 len - (len % frameSize) 个字节。

trans-unit.source: This method will always read an integral number of frames. If the length of the array is not an integral number of frames, a maximum of b.length - (b.length % frameSize) bytes will be read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终读取整数个帧。如果数组的长度不是帧的整数，则将读取最大 b.length - (b.length % frameSize) 个字节。

trans-unit.source: This method will always read an integral number of frames. If the length of the array is not an integral number of frames, a maximum of b.length - (b.length % frameSize) bytes will be read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终读取整数个帧。如果数组的长度不是帧的整数，则将读取最大 b.length - (b.length % frameSize) 个字节。

trans-unit.source: This method will always return false if this component is not displayable because it is impossible to determine the weight of an undisplayable component.
trans-unit.target: 如果此组件不可显示，则此方法将始终返回 false ，因为无法确定不可显示组件的重量。

trans-unit.source: This method will always skip an integral number of frames. If n does not specify an integral number of frames, a maximum of n - (n % frameSize) bytes will be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终跳过整数个帧。如果 n 不指定整数帧，则将最多跳过 n - (n % frameSize) 个字节。

trans-unit.source: This method will attempt to consume one complete SSL/TLS network packet, but will never consume more than the sum of the bytes remaining in the buffers. Each ByteBuffer's position is updated to reflect the amount of data consumed or produced. The limits remain the same.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将尝试使用一个完整的SSL / TLS网络数据包，但永远不会消耗超过缓冲区中剩余字节总数。每个 ByteBuffer 的位置都会更新，以反映消耗或产生的数据量。限制保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This method will attempt to consume one complete SSL/TLS/DTLS network packet, but will never consume more than the sum of the bytes remaining in the buffers. Each ByteBuffer's position is updated to reflect the amount of data consumed or produced. The limits remain the same.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将尝试使用一个完整的SSL / TLS / DTLS网络数据包，但永远不会消耗超过缓冲区中剩余字节总数的总和。每个 ByteBuffer 的位置都会更新，以反映消耗或产生的数据量。限制保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This method will attempt to produce SSL/TLS records, and will consume as much source data as possible, but will never consume more than the sum of the bytes remaining in each buffer. Each ByteBuffer's position is updated to reflect the amount of data consumed or produced. The limits remain the same.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将尝试生成SSL / TLS记录，并且将消耗尽可能多的源数据，但永远不会消耗超过每个缓冲区中剩余字节的总和。每个 ByteBuffer 的位置都会更新，以反映消耗或产生的数据量。限制保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This method will attempt to produce SSL/TLS/DTLS records, and will consume as much source data as possible, but will never consume more than the sum of the bytes remaining in each buffer. Each ByteBuffer's position is updated to reflect the amount of data consumed or produced. The limits remain the same.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将尝试生成SSL / TLS / DTLS记录，并且将消耗尽可能多的源数据，但永远不会消耗超过每个缓冲区中剩余字节总数的总和。每个 ByteBuffer 的位置都会更新，以反映消耗或产生的数据量。限制保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This method will automatically be called on this component when a property value changes such that size, location, or internal layout of this component has been affected. This automatic updating differs from the AWT because programs generally no longer need to invoke validate to get the contents of the GUI to update.
trans-unit.target: 当属性值更改，从而影响了此组件的大小，位置或内部布局时，将在此组件上自动调用此方法。这种自动更新与AWT不同，因为程序通常不再需要调用 validate 来获取要更新的GUI内容。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by dispatchKeyEvent.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将由 dispatchKeyEvent 调用。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by dispatchKeyEvent. By default, this method will handle any unconsumed KeyEvents that map to an AWT MenuShortcut by consuming the event and activating the shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将由 dispatchKeyEvent 调用。默认情况下，此方法将通过使用事件并激活快捷方式来处理映射到AWT MenuShortcut 的所有未使用的KeyEvent 。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by dispatchKeyEvent. It will handle any unconsumed KeyEvents that map to an AWT MenuShortcut by consuming the event and activating the shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将由 dispatchKeyEvent 调用。它将通过使用事件并激活快捷方式来处理映射到AWT MenuShortcut 的所有未使用的KeyEvent 。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by javac for all plugins located by the service loader. If the method returns true, the plugin will be initialized with an empty array of string arguments if it is not otherwise initialized due to an explicit command-line option.
trans-unit.target: 对于由服务加载器定位的所有插件，javac都将调用此方法。如果该方法返回 true ，则如果由于显式命令行选项而未对其进行 initialized ，则该插件将使用字符串参数的空数组进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by the dynamic linker every time the call site is relinked (but see resetAndRelink(GuardedInvocation, MethodHandle) for an exception).
trans-unit.target: 每次重新链接调用站点时，动态链接程序都会调用此方法（但请参阅 resetAndRelink(GuardedInvocation, MethodHandle) 以获取异常）。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by the dynamic linker every time the call site is relinked (but see resetAndRelink(GuardedInvocation, MethodHandle) for an exception). It will be passed a GuardedInvocation that the call site should incorporate into its target method handle. When this method is called, the call site is allowed to keep other non-invalidated invocations around for implementation of polymorphic inline caches and compose them with this invocation to form its final target.
trans-unit.target: 每次重新链接调用站点时，动态链接程序都会调用此方法（但请参阅 resetAndRelink(GuardedInvocation, MethodHandle) 以获取异常）。它将传递一个 GuardedInvocation ，调用站点应将其合并到其目标方法句柄中。调用此方法时，允许调用站点保留其他非无效的调用以实现多态内联高速缓存，并将它们与该调用组合起来以形成其最终目标。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by the dynamic linker every time the call site is relinked and the linker wishes the call site to throw away any prior linkage state (that is how it differs from relink(GuardedInvocation, MethodHandle)).
trans-unit.target: 每次重新链接调用站点时，动态链接器都会调用此方法，并且链接器希望调用站点放弃任何先前的链接状态（这与 relink(GuardedInvocation, MethodHandle) 有所不同）。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by the dynamic linker every time the call site is relinked and the linker wishes the call site to throw away any prior linkage state (that is how it differs from relink(GuardedInvocation, MethodHandle)). It will be passed a GuardedInvocation that the call site should use to build its new target method handle. When this method is called, the call site is discouraged from keeping any previous state, and is supposed to only link the current invocation.
trans-unit.target: 每次重新链接调用站点时，动态链接器都会调用此方法，并且链接器希望调用站点放弃任何先前的链接状态（这与 relink(GuardedInvocation, MethodHandle) 有所不同）。它将传递一个 GuardedInvocation ，调用站点应使用该GuardedInvocation来构建其新的目标方法句柄。调用此方法时，不鼓励调用站点保持任何先前状态，并且应仅链接当前调用。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by the parser at the completion of the parsing of each node.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法将在每个节点的解析完成后被解析器调用。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called by the parser at the completion of the parsing of each node. The node and all of its descendants will exist and be complete. The parent node will also exist, although it may be incomplete, i.e. it may have additional children that have not yet been parsed. Attribute nodes are never passed to this function.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法将在每个节点解析完成后被解析器调用。这个节点和它的所有子节点都将存在并且是完整的。父节点也将存在,尽管它可能是不完整的,即它可能有额外的子节点尚未被解析。属性节点永远不会传递给这个函数。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called to add a subkey into a Sharding Key object being built.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法将被调用,用于将子键添加到正在构建的Sharding Key对象中。

trans-unit.source: This method will be called to add a subkey into a Sharding Key object being built. The order in which subkey method is called is important as it indicates the order of placement of the subkey within the Sharding Key.
trans-unit.target: 本方法将被调用,用于将子键添加到正在构建的 Sharding Key 对象中。调用子键方法的顺序很重要,因为它表示子键在 Sharding Key 中的放置顺序。

trans-unit.source: This method will be invoked within the first thread that accesses the value with the get method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将在使用 get 方法访问值的第一个线程内调用。

trans-unit.source: This method will be invoked within the first thread that accesses the value with the get method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将在使用 get 方法访问该值的第一个线程内调用。

trans-unit.source: This method will cause subsequent invocations of checkError() to return false until another write operation fails and invokes setError().
trans-unit.target: 此方法将导致后续的 checkError() 调用返回 false ,直到另一个写操作失败并调用 setError() 为止。

trans-unit.source: This method will cause subsequent invocations of checkError() to return true until clearError() is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 clearError() 之前，此方法将导致对 checkError() 的后续调用返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This method will cause subsequent invocations of checkError() to return false until another write operation fails and invokes setError().
trans-unit.target: 此方法将导致后续的 checkError() 调用返回 false ,直到另一个写操作失败并调用 setError() 为止。

trans-unit.source: This method will cause subsequent invocations of checkError() to return true until clearError() is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 clearError() 之前，此方法将导致对 checkError() 的后续调用返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This method will cause subsequent invocations of checkError() to return false until another write operation fails and invokes setError().
trans-unit.target: 此方法将导致后续的 checkError() 调用返回 false ,直到另一个写操作失败并调用 setError() 为止。

trans-unit.source: This method will cause subsequent invocations of checkError() to return true until clearError() is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 clearError() 之前，此方法将导致对 checkError() 的后续调用返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This method will continue to return the set of options even after the channel has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 即使在通道关闭后,这个方法将继续返回一组选项。

trans-unit.source: This method will create a formatter based on a simple pattern of letters and symbols as described in the class documentation. For example, d MMM uuuu will format 2011-12-03 as '3 Dec 2011'.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将根据类文档中描述的简单字母和符号模式创建格式化程序。例如， d MMM uuuu 会将2011-12-03格式设置为“ 2011年12月3日”。

trans-unit.source: This method will first search the parent class loader for the resource; if the parent is null the path of the class loader built-in to the virtual machine is searched. That failing, this method will invoke findResource(String) to find the resource.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将首先在父类加载器中搜索资源；如果父级为 null ，则搜索虚拟机内置的类加载器的路径。失败的话，此方法将调用 findResource(String) 来查找资源。

trans-unit.source: This method will initiate the initial handshake if necessary and then block until the handshake has been established.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要,该方法将启动初始握手,然后阻塞,直到握手建立。

trans-unit.source: This method will make a copy of the protocols array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将复制 protocols 数组。

trans-unit.source: This method will modify environment and save a reference to it. The caller may no longer modify it.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将修改 environment 并保存对它的引用。呼叫者可能不再对其进行修改。

trans-unit.source: This method will not cause a connection to be initiated. If the connection was not connected, or if the server did not have an error while connecting or if the server had an error but no error data was sent, this method will return null. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法不会导致连接被启动。如果连接没有连接,或者服务器在连接时没有出错,或者服务器出错但没有发送错误数据,这个方法将返回null。这是默认的。

trans-unit.source: This method will return -1 in the following three cases:
trans-unit.target: 在以下三种情况下,本方法将返回-1。

trans-unit.source: This method will return null if this thread is not blocked waiting for any object or if the object is not owned by any thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果未阻塞此线程等待任何对象，或者该对象不属于任何线程，则此方法将返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This method will return null in the following three cases:
trans-unit.target: 在以下三种情况下，此方法将返回 null ：

trans-unit.source: This method will return a new array each time it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法每次调用时都会返回一个新的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method will return a result whether or not the chronology supports the field.
trans-unit.target: 无论年表是否支持该字段,本方法都将返回一个结果。

trans-unit.source: This method will return an instance of the first implementation class that it is able to load and instantiate successfully from the list of class names collected from the configuration files. This method uses the calling thread's context classloader to find the configuration files and to load the implementation class.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将从从配置文件中收集到的类名列表中返回能够成功加载和实例化的第一个实现类的实例。该方法使用调用线程的上下文classloader来查找配置文件并加载实现类。

trans-unit.source: This method will return the value of the given column as a Java object. The type of the Java object will be the default Java object type corresponding to the column's SQL type, following the mapping for built-in types specified in the JDBC specification. If the value is an SQL NULL, the driver returns a Java null.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将给定列的值作为Java对象返回。按照JDBC规范中指定的内置类型的映射，Java对象的类型将是与列的SQL类型相对应的默认Java对象类型。如果该值为SQL NULL ，则驱动程序将返回Java null 。

trans-unit.source: This method will throw a SecurityException if this KeyboardFocusManager is not the current KeyboardFocusManager for the calling thread's context.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个KeyboardFocusManager不是调用线程上下文的当前KeyboardFocusManager,这个方法将抛出一个SecurityException。

trans-unit.source: This method will throw an exception if the embedded XMLReader does not support the http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes property.
trans-unit.target: 如果嵌入的XMLReader不支持http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes属性,该方法将抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: This method will write the XMLEvent as per the XML 1.0 specification as Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法将按照XML 1.0的规范将XMLEvent写成Unicode字符。

trans-unit.source: This method will write the XMLEvent as per the XML 1.0 specification as Unicode characters. No indentation or whitespace should be outputted. Any user defined event type SHALL have this method called when being written to on an output stream. Built in Event types MUST implement this method, but implementations MAY choose not call these methods for optimizations reasons when writing out built in Events to an output stream. The output generated MUST be equivalent in terms of the infoset expressed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将按照XML 1.0规范将XMLEvent写成Unicode字符。没有缩进或空格应该被输出。任何用户定义的事件类型在被写入输出流时都必须调用此方法。内建的事件类型必须实现这个方法,但实现可以选择不调用这些方法,以优化的原因,当写出内置的事件到一个输出流。生成的输出必须与表达的信息集等价。

trans-unit.source: This method will, on a best-effort basis, throw a ConcurrentModificationException if it is detected that the mapping function modifies this map during computation.
trans-unit.target: 如果检测到映射函数在计算过程中修改了此映射，则该方法将尽最大努力抛出 ConcurrentModificationException 。

trans-unit.source: This method will, on a best-effort basis, throw a ConcurrentModificationException if it is detected that the remapping function modifies this map during computation.
trans-unit.target: 如果检测到重映射函数在计算过程中修改了此映射，则该方法将尽最大努力抛出 ConcurrentModificationException 。

trans-unit.source: This method will, on a best-effort basis, throw a ConcurrentModificationException if the mapping function modified this map during computation.
trans-unit.target: 如果映射函数在计算过程中修改了此映射，则该方法将尽最大努力抛出 ConcurrentModificationException 。

trans-unit.source: This method will, on a best-effort basis, throw a ConcurrentModificationException if the remapping function modified this map during computation.
trans-unit.target: 如果重新映射函数在计算过程中修改了此映射，则该方法将尽最大努力抛出 ConcurrentModificationException 。

trans-unit.source: This method works as if by invoking the two-argument split method with the given input sequence and a limit argument of zero. Trailing empty strings are therefore not included in the resulting array.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的工作方式就像通过调用具有给定输入序列且限制参数为零的二参数 split 方法。因此，结尾的空字符串不包括在结果数组中。

trans-unit.source: This method works as if by invoking the two-argument split method with the given expression and a limit argument of zero. Trailing empty strings are therefore not included in the resulting array.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的工作方式就像通过调用具有给定表达式且限制参数为零的二参数 split 方法。因此，结尾的空字符串不包含在结果数组中。

trans-unit.source: This method works as if by invoking the two-argument split method with the given input sequence and a limit argument of zero. Trailing empty strings are therefore not included in the resulting array.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的工作方式就像通过调用具有给定输入序列且限制参数为零的二参数 split 方法。因此，结尾的空字符串不包括在结果数组中。

trans-unit.source: This method works as if by invoking the two-argument split method with the given expression and a limit argument of zero. Trailing empty strings are therefore not included in the resulting array.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的工作方式就像通过调用具有给定表达式且限制参数为零的二参数 split 方法。因此，结尾的空字符串不包括在结果数组中。

trans-unit.source: This method works as if invoking it were equivalent to evaluating the expression:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法的工作原理就像调用它相当于评估表达式一样。

trans-unit.source: This method works by invoking the decodeLoop method, interpreting its results, handling error conditions, and reinvoking it as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的工作方式是调用 decodeLoop 方法，解释其结果，处理错误情况，并在必要时重新调用它。

trans-unit.source: This method works by invoking the encodeLoop method, interpreting its results, handling error conditions, and reinvoking it as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该方法通过调用 encodeLoop 方法，解释其结果，处理错误条件并在必要时重新调用来起作用。

trans-unit.source: This method works by invoking the decodeLoop method, interpreting its results, handling error conditions, and reinvoking it as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的工作方式是调用 decodeLoop 方法，解释其结果，处理错误情况并在必要时重新调用它。

trans-unit.source: This method works by invoking the encodeLoop method, interpreting its results, handling error conditions, and reinvoking it as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该方法通过调用 encodeLoop 方法，解释其结果，处理错误条件并在必要时重新调用来工作。

trans-unit.source: This method works exactly as specified by resolve except that the graph of resolved modules is augmented with modules induced by the service-use dependence relation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法完全按照由 resolve 所指定的方式工作，不同之处在于，已解析模块的图由服务使用依赖关系所诱导的模块所扩充。

trans-unit.source: This method works in a similar manner to move method when the ATOMIC_MOVE option is specified. That is, this method moves a file as an atomic file system operation. If the srcpath parameter is an absolute path then it locates the source file. If the parameter is a relative path then it is located relative to this open directory. If the targetpath parameter is absolute then it locates the target file (the targetdir parameter is ignored). If the parameter is a relative path it is located relative to the open directory identified by the targetdir parameter. In all cases, if the target file exists then it is implementation specific if it is replaced or this method fails.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ATOMIC_MOVE 选项时，此方法的工作方式类似于 move 方法。也就是说，此方法将文件移动为原子文件系统操作。如果 srcpath 参数是 absolute 路径，则它将找到源文件。如果参数是相对路径，则它相对于此打开目录位于。如果 targetpath 参数是绝对的，则它将找到目标文件（ targetdir 参数将被忽略）。如果参数是相对路径，则它相对于由 targetdir 标识的打开目录位于范围。在所有情况下，如果目标文件存在，则替换目标文件或此方法失败都是特定于实现的。

trans-unit.source: This method works in a similar manner to move method when the ATOMIC_MOVE option is specified. That is, this method moves a file as an atomic file system operation. If the srcpath parameter is an absolute path then it locates the source file. If the parameter is a relative path then it is located relative to this open directory. If the targetpath parameter is absolute then it locates the target file (the targetdir parameter is ignored). If the parameter is a relative path it is located relative to the open directory identified by the targetdir parameter. In all cases, if the target file exists then it is implementation specific if it is replaced or this method fails.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ATOMIC_MOVE 选项时，此方法的工作方式类似于 move 方法。即，此方法将文件移动为原子文件系统操作。如果 srcpath 参数是 absolute 路径，则它将找到源文件。如果参数是相对路径，则它相对于此打开目录位于。如果 targetpath 参数是绝对的，则它将找到目标文件（ targetdir 参数将被忽略）。如果参数是相对路径，则它相对于 targetdir 标识的打开目录位于参数。在所有情况下，如果目标文件存在，则替换目标文件或此方法失败都是特定于实现的。

trans-unit.source: This method works in exactly the manner specified by createTempDirectory(Path,String,FileAttribute[]) method for the case that the dir parameter is the temporary-file directory.
trans-unit.target: 对于 dir 参数是临时文件目录的情况，此方法完全按照 createTempDirectory(Path,String,FileAttribute[]) 方法指定的方式工作。

trans-unit.source: This method works in exactly the manner specified by createTempDirectory(Path,String,FileAttribute[]) method for the case that the dir parameter is the temporary-file directory.
trans-unit.target: 对于 dir 参数是临时文件目录的情况，此方法完全按照 createTempDirectory(Path,String,FileAttribute[]) 方法指定的方式工作。

trans-unit.source: This method works in exactly the manner specified by the createTempFile(Path,String,String,FileAttribute[]) method for the case that the dir parameter is the temporary-file directory.
trans-unit.target: 对于 dir 参数是临时文件目录的情况，此方法完全按照 createTempFile(Path,String,String,FileAttribute[]) 方法指定的方式工作。

trans-unit.source: This method works in exactly the manner specified by the createTempFile(Path,String,String,FileAttribute[]) method for the case that the dir parameter is the temporary-file directory.
trans-unit.target: 对于 dir 参数是临时文件目录的情况，此方法完全按照 createTempFile(Path,String,String,FileAttribute[]) 方法指定的方式工作。

trans-unit.source: This method works in exactly the manner specified by the Files.newByteChannel method for the case that the path parameter is an absolute path. When the parameter is a relative path then the file to open or create is relative to this open directory. In addition to the options defined by the Files.newByteChannel method, the NOFOLLOW_LINKS option may be used to ensure that this method fails if the file is a symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: 在 path 参数是 absolute 路径的情况下，此方法完全按照 Files.newByteChannel 方法指定的方式工作。如果参数是相对路径，则要打开或创建的文件是相对于此打开目录的。除了由 Files.newByteChannel 方法定义的选项之外，如果文件是符号链接，则可以使用 NOFOLLOW_LINKS 选项来确保此方法失败。

trans-unit.source: This method works in exactly the manner specified by the Files.newByteChannel method for the case that the path parameter is an absolute path. When the parameter is a relative path then the file to open or create is relative to this open directory. In addition to the options defined by the Files.newByteChannel method, the NOFOLLOW_LINKS option may be used to ensure that this method fails if the file is a symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: 在 path 参数是 absolute 路径的情况下，此方法完全按照 Files.newByteChannel 方法指定的方式工作。如果参数是相对路径，则要打开或创建的文件相对于此打开目录。除了由 Files.newByteChannel 方法定义的选项之外，如果文件是符号链接，则可以使用 NOFOLLOW_LINKS 选项来确保此方法失败。

trans-unit.source: This method works in exactly the manner specified by the newDirectoryStream method for the case that the path parameter is an absolute path. When the parameter is a relative path then the directory to open is relative to this open directory. The NOFOLLOW_LINKS option may be used to ensure that this method fails if the file is a symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: 在 path 参数是 absolute 路径的情况下，此方法完全按照 newDirectoryStream 方法指定的方式工作。如果参数是相对路径，则要打开的目录是相对于此打开目录的。该 NOFOLLOW_LINKS 选项可用于确保如果该文件是一个符号链接，此方法将失败。

trans-unit.source: This method works in exactly the manner specified by the newDirectoryStream method for the case that the path parameter is an absolute path. When the parameter is a relative path then the directory to open is relative to this open directory. The NOFOLLOW_LINKS option may be used to ensure that this method fails if the file is a symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: 在 path 参数是 absolute 路径的情况下，此方法完全按照 newDirectoryStream 方法指定的方式工作。如果参数是相对路径，则要打开的目录是相对于此打开目录的。该 NOFOLLOW_LINKS 选项可用于确保如果该文件是一个符号链接，此方法将失败。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the read(ByteBuffer) method, except that bytes are read starting at the given file position rather than at the channel's current position. This method does not modify this channel's position. If the given position is greater than the file's current size then no bytes are read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 read(ByteBuffer) 方法的工作方式相同，除了从给定文件位置而不是通道当前位置开始读取字节。此方法不会修改此通道的位置。如果给定位置大于文件的当前大小，则不会读取任何字节。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the write(ByteBuffer) method, except that bytes are written starting at the given file position rather than at the channel's current position. This method does not modify this channel's position. If the given position is greater than the file's current size then the file will be grown to accommodate the new bytes; the values of any bytes between the previous end-of-file and the newly-written bytes are unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 write(ByteBuffer) 方法的工作方式相同，除了字节是从给定文件位置开始而不是从通道的当前位置开始写入的。此方法不会修改此通道的位置。如果给定位置大于文件的当前大小，则文件将增长以容纳新的字节；否则，文件将增长。未指定前一个文件末尾与新写入的字节之间的任何字节的值。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the AsynchronousByteChannel.read(ByteBuffer) method, except that bytes are read starting at the given file position. If the given file position is greater than the file's size at the time that the read is attempted then no bytes are read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的工作方式与 AsynchronousByteChannel.read(ByteBuffer) 方法相同，不同之处在于从给定文件位置开始读取字节。如果给定的文件位置大于尝试读取时的文件大小，则不会读取任何字节。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the AsynchronousByteChannel.read(ByteBuffer,Object,CompletionHandler) method, except that bytes are read starting at the given file position. If the given file position is greater than the file's size at the time that the read is attempted then no bytes are read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的工作方式与 AsynchronousByteChannel.read(ByteBuffer,Object,CompletionHandler) 方法相同，不同之处在于从给定文件位置开始读取字节。如果给定的文件位置大于尝试读取时的文件大小，则不会读取任何字节。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the AsynchronousByteChannel.read(ByteBuffer) method, except that bytes are read starting at the given file position. If the given file position is greater than the file's size at the time that the read is attempted then no bytes are read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以与 AsynchronousByteChannel.read(ByteBuffer) 方法相同的方式工作，除了从给定文件位置开始读取字节。如果给定的文件位置大于尝试读取时的文件大小，则不会读取任何字节。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the AsynchronousByteChannel.read(ByteBuffer,Object,CompletionHandler) method, except that bytes are read starting at the given file position. If the given file position is greater than the file's size at the time that the read is attempted then no bytes are read.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 AsynchronousByteChannel.read(ByteBuffer,Object,CompletionHandler) 方法的工作方式相同，除了从给定文件位置开始读取字节。如果给定的文件位置大于尝试读取时的文件大小，则不会读取任何字节。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the AsynchronousByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer) method, except that bytes are written starting at the given file position. If the given position is greater than the file's size, at the time that the write is attempted, then the file will be grown to accommodate the new bytes; the values of any bytes between the previous end-of-file and the newly-written bytes are unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的工作方式与 AsynchronousByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer) 方法相同，除了字节是从给定文件位置开始写入的。如果给定的位置大于文件的大小，则在尝试写操作时，文件将被增长以容纳新的字节；否则，文件将被保留。未指定前一个文件末尾与新写入的字节之间的任何字节的值。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the AsynchronousByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer,Object,CompletionHandler) method, except that bytes are written starting at the given file position. If the given position is greater than the file's size, at the time that the write is attempted, then the file will be grown to accommodate the new bytes; the values of any bytes between the previous end-of-file and the newly-written bytes are unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 AsynchronousByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer,Object,CompletionHandler) 方法的工作方式相同，除了字节是从给定文件位置开始写入的。如果给定的位置大于文件的大小，则在尝试写操作时，文件将被增长以容纳新的字节；否则，文件将被保留。未指定前一个文件末尾与新写入的字节之间的任何字节的值。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the AsynchronousByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer) method, except that bytes are written starting at the given file position. If the given position is greater than the file's size, at the time that the write is attempted, then the file will be grown to accommodate the new bytes; the values of any bytes between the previous end-of-file and the newly-written bytes are unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 AsynchronousByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer) 方法的工作方式相同，除了字节是从给定文件位置开始写入的。如果给定的位置大于文件的大小，则在尝试写入时，文件将增长以容纳新的字节；未指定前一个文件末尾与新写入的字节之间的任何字节的值。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the AsynchronousByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer,Object,CompletionHandler) method, except that bytes are written starting at the given file position. If the given position is greater than the file's size, at the time that the write is attempted, then the file will be grown to accommodate the new bytes; the values of any bytes between the previous end-of-file and the newly-written bytes are unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 AsynchronousByteChannel.write(ByteBuffer,Object,CompletionHandler) 方法的工作方式相同，除了字节是从给定文件位置开始写入的。如果给定的位置大于文件的大小，则在尝试写入时，文件将增长以容纳新的字节；未指定前一个文件末尾与新写入的字节之间的任何字节的值。

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the read(ByteBuffer) method, except that bytes are read starting at the given file position rather than at the channel's current position. This method does not modify this channel's position. If the given position is greater than the file's current size then no bytes are read.

trans-unit.source: This method works in the same manner as the write(ByteBuffer) method, except that bytes are written starting at the given file position rather than at the channel's current position. This method does not modify this channel's position. If the given position is greater than the file's current size then the file will be grown to accommodate the new bytes; the values of any bytes between the previous end-of-file and the newly-written bytes are unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 write(ByteBuffer) 方法的工作方式相同，除了字节是从给定文件位置而不是通道当前位置开始写入的。此方法不会修改此通道的位置。如果给定位置大于文件的当前大小，则文件将增长以容纳新的字节；未指定前一个文件末尾与新写入的字节之间的任何字节的值。

trans-unit.source: This method writes out the preamble associated with the XML encoding if it has not been written already and then writes out all of the values that been written to the stream since the last time flush was called.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未编写与XML编码关联的前导，则此方法将其写出，然后写出自上次调用 flush 以来已写入流中的所有值。

trans-unit.source: This method writes out the preamble associated with the XML encoding if it has not been written already and then writes out all of the values that been written to the stream since the last time flush was called. After flushing, all internal references to the values that were written to this stream are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未编写与XML编码关联的前导，则此方法将其写出，然后写出自上次调用 flush 以来已写入流中的所有值。刷新后，将清除对写入此流的值的所有内部引用。

trans-unit.source: This method writes the value of the attribute from a given buffer as a sequence of bytes. The size of the value to transfer is r, where r is the number of bytes remaining in the buffer, that is src.remaining(). The sequence of bytes is transferred from the buffer starting at index p, where p is the buffer's position. Upon return, the buffer's position will be equal to p + n, where n is the number of bytes transferred; its limit will not have changed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将给定缓冲区中的属性值作为字节序列写入。要传输的值的大小为 r ，其中 r 是缓冲区中剩余的字节数，即 src.remaining() 。字节序列从缓冲区开始，从索引 p 开始传输，其中 p 是缓冲区的位置。返回时，缓冲区的位置将等于 p + n ，其中 n 是传输的字节数。它的限制不会改变。

trans-unit.source: This method writes the value of the attribute from a given buffer as a sequence of bytes. The size of the value to transfer is r, where r is the number of bytes remaining in the buffer, that is src.remaining(). The sequence of bytes is transferred from the buffer starting at index p, where p is the buffer's position. Upon return, the buffer's position will be equal to p + n, where n is the number of bytes transferred; its limit will not have changed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将给定缓冲区中的属性值作为字节序列写入。要传输的值的大小为 r ，其中 r 是缓冲区中剩余的字节数，即 src.remaining() 。字节序列从缓冲区开始，从索引 p 开始传输，其中 p 是缓冲区的位置。返回时，缓冲区的位置将等于 p + n ，其中 n 是传输的字节数；它的限制不会改变。

trans-unit.source: This method's primary purpose is to shift a block of lines as far as possible to the left, while preserving relative indentation. Lines that were indented the least will thus have no leading white space. The result will have the same number of line terminators as this string. If this string ends with a line terminator then the result will end with a line terminator.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的主要目的是在保持相对缩进的同时，将一行线尽可能向左移动。因此，缩进最少的行将没有前导空白。结果将具有与此字符串相同数量的行终止符。如果此字符串以行终止符结尾，那么结果将以行终止符结尾。

trans-unit.source: This method, which is specified in the AbstractInterruptibleChannel class and is invoked by the close method, in turn invokes the implCloseSelectableChannel method in order to perform the actual work of closing this channel. It then cancels all of this channel's keys.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在 AbstractInterruptibleChannel 类中指定，并由 close 方法调用，然后依次调用 implCloseSelectableChannel 方法，以执行关闭此通道的实际工作。然后，它将取消此通道的所有键。

trans-unit.source: This method, which is specified in the AbstractInterruptibleChannel class and is invoked by the close method, in turn invokes the implCloseSelectableChannel method in order to perform the actual work of closing this channel. It then cancels all of this channel's keys.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在 AbstractInterruptibleChannel 类中指定，并由 close 方法调用，然后依次调用 implCloseSelectableChannel 方法，以执行关闭此通道的实际工作。然后，它将取消此通道的所有键。

trans-unit.source: This method, which simply returns this BigDecimal is included for symmetry with the unary minus method negate().
trans-unit.target: 一元减法 negate() 对称性地包含此方法，该方法仅返回此 BigDecimal 。

trans-unit.source: This method, which simply returns this BigDecimal is included for symmetry with the unary minus method negate().
trans-unit.target: 一元减法 negate() 出于对称性而包含此方法，该方法仅返回此 BigDecimal 。

trans-unit.source: This might be confusing for the code calling createMBean() or registerMBean(), as such code might assume that MBean registration has failed when such an exception is raised. Therefore it is recommended that implementations of postRegister do not throw Runtime Exceptions or Errors if it can be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 这对于调用 createMBean() 或 registerMBean() 的代码可能会造成混淆，因为此类代码可能会假定在引发此类异常时MBean注册失败。因此，如果可以避免，建议 postRegister 的实现不要抛出运行时异常或错误。

trans-unit.source: This might be confusing for the code calling unregisterMBean(), as it might assume that MBean deregistration has failed. Therefore it is recommended that implementations of postDeregister do not throw Runtime Exceptions or Errors if it can be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 这对于调用 unregisterMBean() 的代码可能会造成混淆，因为它可能假定MBean注销失败。因此，如果可以避免，建议 postDeregister 的实现不要抛出运行时异常或错误。

trans-unit.source: This might seem to be equivalent, if not better, but in fact it introduced a large nonuniformity because of the bias in the rounding of floating-point numbers: it was three times as likely that the low-order bit of the significand would be 0 than that it would be 1! This nonuniformity probably doesn't matter much in practice, but we strive for perfection.]
trans-unit.target: 这似乎是等价的,如果不是更好的话,但事实上,由于浮点数的四舍五入的偏差,它引入了一个很大的非均匀性:低阶位的significand为0的可能性是1的三倍!这个非均匀性可能在实践中并不重要,但我们追求完美。这种非均匀性在实践中可能并不重要,但我们追求完美。]

trans-unit.source: This might seem to be equivalent, if not better, but in fact it introduced a slight nonuniformity because of the bias in the rounding of floating-point numbers: it was slightly more likely that the low-order bit of the significand would be 0 than that it would be 1.]
trans-unit.target: 这似乎是等价的,如果不是更好的话,但事实上,由于浮点数的四舍五入的偏差,它引入了轻微的非均匀性:意义的低阶位为0的可能性比为1的可能性略大。]

trans-unit.source: This minimal extension to LayoutManager is intended for tool providers who wish to the creation of constraint-based layouts. It does not yet provide full, general support for custom constraint-based layout managers.
trans-unit.target: 这个LayoutManager的最小扩展是为那些希望创建基于约束的布局的工具提供者准备的。它还没有为自定义的基于约束的布局管理器提供完整的、通用的支持。

trans-unit.source: This mode is a combination of ON and INSERT, specifying that data can be dropped on existing items, or in insert locations as specified by INSERT.
trans-unit.target: 此模式是 ON 和 INSERT 的组合，指定可以将数据放在现有项目上或 INSERT 指定的插入位置中。

trans-unit.source: This mode is a combination of ON and INSERT_COLS, specifying that data can be dropped on existing items, or as insert columns as specified by INSERT_COLS.
trans-unit.target: 此模式是 ON 和 INSERT_COLS 的组合，指定可以将数据拖放到现有项目上，或作为 INSERT_COLS 指定的插入列。

trans-unit.source: This mode is a combination of ON and INSERT_ROWS, specifying that data can be dropped on existing items, or as insert rows as specified by INSERT_ROWS.
trans-unit.target: 此模式是 ON 和 INSERT_ROWS 的组合，指定可以将数据拖放到现有项目上，或作为 INSERT_ROWS 指定的插入行。

trans-unit.source: This mode uses the very simple method of redrawing the entire contents of the scrollpane each time it is scrolled.
trans-unit.target: 该模式使用非常简单的方法,即每次滚动时重绘滚动框的全部内容。

trans-unit.source: This mode uses the very simple method of redrawing the entire contents of the scrollpane each time it is scrolled. This was the default behavior in Swing 1.0 and Swing 1.1. Either of the other two options will provide better performance in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 该模式使用非常简单的方法,即每次滚动时重新绘制滚动框的全部内容。这是Swing 1.0和Swing 1.1中的默认行为。在大多数情况下,其他两个选项中的任何一个都会提供更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: This model does require that a JAAS login be performed in order to authenticate and populate a Subject that the JGSS mechanism can later utilize. However, applications have the ability to relax this restriction by means of a system property: javax.security.auth.useSubjectCredsOnly. By default this system property will be assumed to be true (even when it is unset) indicating that providers must only use the credentials that are present in the current Subject. However, if this property is explicitly set to false by the application, then it indicates that the provider is free to use any credentials cache of its choice. Such a credential cache might be a disk cache, an in-memory cache, or even just the current Subject itself.
trans-unit.target: 该模型确实需要执行 JAAS login ，以认证和填充JGSS机制以后可以利用的Subject。但是，应用程序可以通过系统属性 javax.security.auth.useSubjectCredsOnly 放宽此限制。默认情况下，将假定此系统属性为 true （即使未设置它也是如此），指示提供程序必须仅使用当前主题中存在的凭据。但是，如果应用程序将此属性显式设置为false，则表明提供者可以自由使用其选择的任何凭据缓存。这样的凭据缓存可能是磁盘缓存，内存缓存，甚至只是当前的Subject本身。

trans-unit.source: This model does require that a JAAS login be performed in order to authenticate and populate a Subject that the JGSS mechanism can later utilize. However, applications have the ability to relax this restriction by means of a system property: javax.security.auth.useSubjectCredsOnly. By default this system property will be assumed to be true (even when it is unset) indicating that providers must only use the credentials that are present in the current Subject. However, if this property is explicitly set to false by the application, then it indicates that the provider is free to use any credentials cache of its choice. Such a credential cache might be a disk cache, an in-memory cache, or even just the current Subject itself.
trans-unit.target: 该模型确实需要执行 JAAS login ，以认证和填充JGSS机制以后可以利用的Subject。但是，应用程序可以通过系统属性 javax.security.auth.useSubjectCredsOnly 放宽此限制。默认情况下，将假定此系统属性为 true （即使未设置它也是如此），指示提供程序必须仅使用当前主题中存在的凭据。但是，如果应用程序将此属性显式设置为false，则表明提供者可以自由使用其选择的任何凭据缓存。这样的凭据缓存可能是磁盘缓存，内存缓存，甚至只是当前的Subject本身。

trans-unit.source: This model has the advantage that credential management is simple and predictable from the applications point of view. An application, given the right permissions, can purge the credentials in the Subject or renew them using standard Java API's. If it purged the credentials, it would be sure that the JGSS mechanism would fail, or if it renewed a time based credential it would be sure that a JGSS mechanism would succeed.
trans-unit.target: 这种模式的优点是,从应用程序的角度来看,凭证管理是简单和可预测的。一个应用程序,如果有正确的权限,可以清除Subject中的凭证,或者使用标准的Java API来更新凭证。如果它清除了凭证,就可以确定JGSS机制会失败,如果它更新了基于时间的凭证,就可以确定JGSS机制会成功。

trans-unit.source: This model inherits a ChangeListener. The ChangeListeners are notified whenever the model's value or list properties changes.
trans-unit.target: 该模型继承了 ChangeListener 。该 ChangeListener ，就会通知每当该模型的 value 或 list 的属性变化。

trans-unit.source: This model inherits a ChangeListener. The ChangeListeners are notified whenever the model's value, stepSize, minimum, or maximum properties changes.
trans-unit.target: 该模型继承了 ChangeListener 。该 ChangeListeners 通知每当模型的 value ， stepSize 的， minimum 或 maximum 性能的变化。

trans-unit.source: This model inherits a ChangeListener. The ChangeListeners are notified whenever the models value, calendarField, start, or end properties changes.
trans-unit.target: 该模型继承了 ChangeListener 。该 ChangeListeners 通知每当模型 value ， calendarField ， start 或 end 的属性变化。

trans-unit.source: This model is used for regular buttons, as well as check boxes and radio buttons, which are special kinds of buttons. In practice, a button's UI takes the responsibility of calling methods on its model to manage the state, as detailed below:
trans-unit.target: 这个模型用于普通按钮,以及复选框和单选按钮等特殊类型的按钮。在实际操作中,按钮的UI负责调用其模型上的方法来管理状态,具体如下。

trans-unit.source: This modifier does not correspond to a module flag in the binary form of a module declaration (module-info.class).
trans-unit.target: 此修饰符不对应于模块声明（ module-info.class ）的二进制形式的模块标志。

trans-unit.source: This module allows a Java Virtual Machine to be monitored and managed via JMX API. See more information from the Monitoring and Management Using JMX guide.
trans-unit.target: 该模块允许通过JMX API监视和管理Java虚拟机。请参阅《使用JMX进行监视和管理》指南中的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This module also contains GSS-API mechanisms including Kerberos v5 and SPNEGO.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还包含GSS-API机制,包括Kerberos v5和SPNEGO。

trans-unit.source: This module also contains SASL mechanisms including DIGEST-MD5, CRAM-MD5, and NTLM.
trans-unit.target: 该模块还包含SASL机制,包括DIGEST-MD5、CRAM-MD5和NTLM。

trans-unit.source: This module also recognizes the following optional Configuration options:
trans-unit.target: 该模块还识别以下可选的“ Configuration 选项：

trans-unit.source: This module includes a simple command-line debugger, jdb.
trans-unit.target: 该模块包括一个简单的命令行调试器jdb。

trans-unit.source: This module includes the jhsdb tool to attach to a running Java Virtual Machine (JVM) or launch a postmortem debugger to analyze the content of a core-dump from a crashed JVM.
trans-unit.target: 该模块包括jhsdb工具，可将其附加到正在运行的Java虚拟机（JVM）或启动事后调试器以分析崩溃的JVM中核心转储的内容。

trans-unit.source: This module is upgradeable.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块是可以升级的。

trans-unit.source: This module operates in one of three modes:
trans-unit.target: 该模块以三种模式之一运行。

trans-unit.source: This module provides support for Java Programming Language 'snippet' evaluating tools, such as Read-Eval-Print Loops (REPLs), including the jshell tool.
trans-unit.target: 此模块提供对Java编程语言“代码段”评估工具的支持，例如包括jshell工具的Read-Eval-Print Loops（REPL）。

trans-unit.source: This module provides the JMXConnectorProvider service, which creates JMX connector clients using the RMI protocol. Instances of JMXConnector can be obtained via the JMXConnectorFactory.newJMXConnector factory method. It also provides the JMXConnectorServerProvider service, which creates JMX connector servers using the RMI protocol. Instances of JMXConnectorServer can be obtained via the JMXConnectorServerFactory.newJMXConnectorServer factory method.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了 JMXConnectorProvider 服务，该服务使用RMI协议创建JMX连接器客户端。可以通过 JMXConnectorFactory.newJMXConnector 工厂方法获取 JMXConnector 的实例。它还提供了 JMXConnectorServerProvider 服务，该服务使用RMI协议创建JMX连接器服务器。可以通过 JMXConnectorServerFactory.newJMXConnectorServer 工厂方法获取 JMXConnectorServer 的实例。

trans-unit.source: This module provides the equivalent of command-line access to jar via the ToolProvider SPI. Instances of the tool can be obtained by calling ToolProvider.findFirst or the service loader with the name "jar".
trans-unit.target: 此模块提供等效于通过 ToolProvider SPI的命令行对jar的访问。可以通过调用 ToolProvider.findFirst 或名称为 "jar" 的服务加载程序来获得该工具的实例。

trans-unit.source: This module provides the equivalent of command-line access to javac via the ToolProvider and Tool service provider interfaces (SPIs), and more flexible access via the JavaCompiler SPI.
trans-unit.target: 该模块等效于通过 ToolProvider 和 Tool 服务提供者接口（SPI）进行javac的命令行访问，并通过 JavaCompiler SPI提供更灵活的访问。

trans-unit.source: This module provides the equivalent of command-line access to javadoc via the ToolProvider and Tool service provider interfaces (SPIs), and more flexible access via the DocumentationTool SPI.
trans-unit.target: 该模块等效于通过 ToolProvider 和 Tool 服务提供者接口（SPI）进行javadoc的命令行访问，并通过 DocumentationTool SPI提供更灵活的访问。

trans-unit.source: This module provides the equivalent of command-line access to jpackage via the ToolProvider SPI. Instances of the tool can be obtained by calling ToolProvider.findFirst or the service loader with the name "jpackage".
trans-unit.target: 该模块等效于通过 ToolProvider SPI的命令行访问jpackage。可以通过调用 ToolProvider.findFirst 或名称为 "jpackage" 的 service loader 来获取该工具的实例。

trans-unit.source: This module provides the equivalent of command-line access to the javap and jdeps tools via the ToolProvider service provider interface (SPI)
trans-unit.target: 该模块通过 ToolProvider 服务提供者接口（SPI）提供等效于命令行的javap和jdeps工具访问

trans-unit.source: This module provides the equivalent of command-line access to the jlink and jmod tools via the ToolProvider SPI. Instances of the tools can be obtained by calling ToolProvider.findFirst or the service loader with the name "jlink" or "jmod" as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 此模块提供的命令行访问的等效JLINK和JMOD经由工具 ToolProvider SPI。的工具实例可以通过调用获得 ToolProvider.findFirst 或 service loader 一个名为 "jlink" 或 "jmod" 适当。

trans-unit.source: This module uses the FileSystemProvider API to locate file system providers. In particular, this means that a jar file system provider, such as that in the jdk.zipfs module, must be available if the compiler is to be able to read JAR files.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用 FileSystemProvider API查找文件系统提供程序。特别是，这意味着如果编译器要读取JAR文件，则jar文件系统提供程序（例如 jdk.zipfs 模块中的文件系统提供程序）必须可用。

trans-unit.source: This module's version, or an empty Optional if the module does not have a version or the version is unparseable
trans-unit.target: 此模块的版本，如果模块没有版本或版本不可解析，则为空 Optional

trans-unit.source: This month-day will be passed to the formatter to produce a string.
trans-unit.target: 这个月日将被传递给formatter,产生一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: This moves the JComponent and repaints the damaged areas.
trans-unit.target: 这将移动 JComponent 并重新绘制损坏的区域。

trans-unit.source: This must be a positive integer that identifies the particular interface and scope as understood by the system. Usually, the numeric values can be determined through administration tools on the system. Each interface may have multiple values, one for each scope. If the scope is unspecified, then the default value used is zero.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是一个正整数,用于标识系统所理解的特定接口和范围。通常,数值可以通过系统上的管理工具来确定。每个接口可以有多个值,每个作用域一个。如果作用域未指定,则使用的默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: This must be implemented by subclasses of Permission, as they are the only ones that can impose semantics on a Permission object.
trans-unit.target: 这必须由Permission的子类来实现,因为只有它们才能对Permission对象施加语义。

trans-unit.source: This must be the exact string that is returned by NetworkInterface.getName() for the particular interface in question. When an Inet6Address is created in this way, the numeric scope-id is determined at the time the object is created by querying the relevant NetworkInterface.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是 NetworkInterface.getName() 对于所讨论的特定接口返回的确切字符串。以这种方式创建Inet6Address时，通过查询相关的NetworkInterface来确定对象创建时的数字作用域ID。

trans-unit.source: This must be the exact string that is returned by NetworkInterface.getName() for the particular interface in question. When an Inet6Address is created in this way, the numeric scope-id is determined at the time the object is created by querying the relevant NetworkInterface.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是 NetworkInterface.getName() 对于所讨论的特定接口返回的确切字符串。以这种方式创建Inet6Address时，通过查询相关的NetworkInterface来确定对象创建时的数字作用域ID。

trans-unit.source: This new CachedRowSet object will have its properties set to the default properties of a BaseRowSet object, and, in addition, it will have an RIOptimisticProvider object as its synchronization provider. RIOptimisticProvider, one of two SyncProvider implementations included in the RI, is the default provider that the SyncFactory singleton will supply when no synchronization provider is specified.
trans-unit.target: 这个新的 CachedRowSet 对象将其属性设置为 BaseRowSet 对象的默认属性，此外，它将具有 RIOptimisticProvider 对象作为其同步提供程序。 RIOptimisticProvider 是RI中包含的两个 SyncProvider 实现之一，它是未指定同步提供程序时 SyncFactory 单例将提供的默认提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This new behavior can be turned off, and the old formatting restored, by specifying a property in the logging configuration. If LogManager.getLogManager().getProperty( this.getClass().getName()+".useInstant") is "false" or "0", the old formatting will be restored.
trans-unit.target: 通过在日志记录配置中指定一个属性，可以关闭此新行为，并恢复旧格式。如果 LogManager.getLogManager().getProperty( this.getClass().getName()+".useInstant") 为 "false" 或 "0" ，则将恢复旧格式。

trans-unit.source: This new pseudorandom-number generator is used thereafter for all calls to this method and is used nowhere else.
trans-unit.target: 此后,这个新的伪随机数生成器将用于所有对该方法的调用,而不是用于其他地方。

trans-unit.source: This normalizes the years and months units, leaving the days unit unchanged. The months unit is adjusted to have an absolute value less than 11, with the years unit being adjusted to compensate. For example, a period of "1 Year and 15 months" will be normalized to "2 years and 3 months".
trans-unit.target: 这就使年和月单位正常化,使日单位保持不变。月份单位被调整为绝对值小于11,而年份单位则被调整为补偿。例如,"1年零15个月 "将被归一化为 "2年零3个月"。

trans-unit.source: This normalizes the years and months units, leaving the days unit unchanged. The months unit is adjusted to have an absolute value less than 12, with the years unit being adjusted to compensate. For example, a period of "1 Year and 15 months" will be normalized to "2 years and 3 months".
trans-unit.target: 这就使年和月单位正常化,使日单位保持不变。月数单位调整为绝对值小于12,年数单位调整为补偿。例如,"1年零15个月 "将被归一化为 "2年零3个月"。

trans-unit.source: This notification is useful for disconnecting from network services prior to sleep, or re-establishing a connection if the network configuration has changed during sleep.
trans-unit.target: 该通知对于在睡眠前断开网络服务,或在睡眠期间网络配置发生变化时重新建立连接非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This notification is useful for discontinuing a costly animation, or indicating that the user is no longer present on a network service.
trans-unit.target: 该通知对于中止昂贵的动画,或者表明用户不再出现在网络服务上很有用。

trans-unit.source: This notification is useful for showing a new document when your app has no open windows.
trans-unit.target: 当您的应用程序没有打开的窗口时,该通知对显示新文档很有用。

trans-unit.source: This notification will be emitted when the memory usage of a memory pool is greater than or equal to its collection usage threshold after the Java virtual machine has expended effort in recycling unused objects in that memory pool.
trans-unit.target: 在Java虚拟机花费大量精力回收该内存池中未使用的对象之后，如果内存池的内存使用量大于或等于其收集使用量阈值，则将发出此通知。

trans-unit.source: This notification will be emitted when the memory usage of a memory pool is increased and has reached or exceeded its usage threshold value. Subsequent crossing of the usage threshold value does not cause further notification until the memory usage has returned to become less than the usage threshold value.
trans-unit.target: 当内存池的内存使用量增加并且达到或超过其使用量阈值时，将发出此通知。直到内存使用量返回到小于使用量阈值为止，使用量阈值的后续跨越不会引起进一步的通知。

trans-unit.source: This number of documents attribute's value and object's value are equal.

trans-unit.source: This object is not used internally by the drawing machinery of the JTable; identifiers may be set in the TableColumn as an optional way to tag and locate table columns. The table package does not modify or invoke any methods in these identifier objects other than the equals method which is used in the getColumnIndex() method in the DefaultTableColumnModel.
trans-unit.target: JTable 的绘图设备内部不使用此对象；可以在 TableColumn 中设置标识符，以作为标记和定位表列的可选方式。除了在 DefaultTableColumnModel 的 getColumnIndex() 方法中使用的 equals 方法之外，表包不会修改或调用这些标识符对象中的任何方法。
